events.name: Our 500-Million-Year-Old Immune System Keeps Us Alive—And Now We Understand How It Knows When to Activate
events.description: The immune system has evolved to act as a first responder against infections, and scientists have revealed how it knows when to activate.

generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious history of Mercer County, where our 500-million-year-old immune system keeps us alive – and now we understand how it knows when to activate. Discover the region's fascinating past, from prehistoric fossils to modern-day mysteries.
